entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
